description: Wondering how to make the best omelette? This kid-friendly recipe is ready in 15 minutes. Made using cheese and herbs, this breakfast recipe is sure to impress.
keywords: Omelette,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Quick & easy breakfast,Tree nut free,Egg,Summer,Christmas,Mar 2021,Spinach,Peanut free
name: Herb Omelette Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 cup mixed fresh herb leaves, roughly chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Whisk eggs, milk and cheese in jug until combined. Season with pepper.

Spray a 24cm frying pan with oil and heat over medium-low heat. Pour in half the egg mixture and tilt pan to evenly coat base. As the edges set, lift with a spatula to allow uncooked egg to run underneath. Cook for 1 minute. Scatter over half each of the herbs, onion and spinach. Transfer to a plate. Repeat with remaining egg mixture, herbs, onion and spinach.
